name: The Walton Massacre
description:
The Walton Massacre is a game based lightly off of the movie "The Belko Expiriment". The game takes place Bronx at Walton high school prom in 1985.

Programer: Melissa Mendoza

Co-Programer & Images : Aurelia Gomez 

Sound Design: Lucy Diaz, and Edward Maria

Graphic Design: Ramon Gomez
